title: Get Gortash's Netherstone
content:
Get Gortash's Netherstone Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Wyrm's Rock Reward

Get Gortash's Netherstone

Get Gortash's Netherstone is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Get Gortash's Netherstone can be acquired during Act 3 as part of Confront the Elder Brain. Complete this Quest to obtain one of the Three Netherstones that you need to collect. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more power
